Before you open an issue, PLEASE MAKE SURE:
1. If you're intending to add a new link / package into this list, PLEASE CREATE A PULL REQUEST directly. Don't open issue for such thing or IT WILL BE CLOSED DIRECTLY.
2. If you're going to create a PR, please don't reorder the existing list according to your personal preference. Instead, the list should be (roughly) sorted by its popularity. 
3. Any other issue, proposal, discussion, please feel free and open an issue.
